name: Alexis Dean

coverLetter: Hello, my name is Alexis Dean. I am 21 years old and live in Koreatown, Los Angeles with my fianc√© and my dog. I have experience in this field and a ton of product knowledge. I was a delivery driver for a dispensary delivery service when I used to live in Arizona. I also helped out with dispatch duties and product organization when needed. I am very reliable and an extremely hard worker. I am always willing to go the extra mile and my work ethic is second to none. I also have a completely available schedule and am flexible to any hours. I can adapt to any work environment and learn new things extremely fast.
